Name: Potential Failover Scenario For Cronus Services
Description:
Potential Failover Scenario For Cronus Services; see Splunk results for more information.

SOP: https://info.citrite.net/x/vexLWg

Properties.Search:
ServiceName IN (Ticketing, Trust, CredentialWallet, DelegatedAdministration, PolicySets, ServicePrincipals) 
 EventType=Performance OR EventType=ApiPerformance 
 | eval RequestUri = json_extract(Message, "Uri") 
 | where NOT LIKE(RequestUri, "%-direct-%") AND NOT LIKE(RequestUri, "%-asfdirect-%") 
 | rex field=source ".+\/(?<LoggingLayer>.+)\/(?<LoggingRegion>.+)\/(?<release>.+)\/" 
 | rex field=RequestUri "\/(?<RequestService>\w+)-(?<RequestRegion>\w+)-(?<RequestLayer>\w+)-" 
 | where lower(LoggingRegion) != lower(RequestRegion) 
 | stats count by ServiceName, source, LoggingRegion, RequestRegion 
 | where count > 100

SlackChannel.Message:
PRODUCTION: Potential failover scenario for $result.ServiceName$ in $result.RequestRegion$!

The service in $result.LoggingRegion$ handled $result.count$ requests originally meant for $result.RequestRegion$

See all results <$results_link$|here>. Alert generated from <$view_link$|$name$>
